languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy who attacks them for the first time, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Bladedancer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy who has yet to attack them, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}.
Whenever the Bladedancer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy that hadn't attacked the Bladedancer yet, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of Death From Above.
Whenever the Bladedancer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy that hadn't attacked the Bladedancer yet, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of Death From Above.
Whenever the Bladedancer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy who has yet to attack them, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of Death From Above.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque realizado por un enemigo que le ataca por primera vez, gana +1 carga de {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy who attacks them for the first time, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque realizado por un enemigo que le ataca por primera vez, gana +1 carga de {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}.

Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque realizado por un enemigo que aún no le ha atacado, gana +1 carga de {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が、まだ攻撃されていない敵からの初攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたび、ブレードダンサーは{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}の+1チャージを得る。

languages.text: 在本场战斗中，当敌人首次攻击刀锋舞者时，若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了此次攻击，则会获得1次{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}的使用次数。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by an enemy who attacks them for the first time, the Bladedancer gains +1 charge of {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在本场战斗中，当敌人首次攻击刀锋舞者时，若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了此次攻击，则会获得1次{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}的使用次数。
在本场战斗中，当之前从未攻击过刀锋舞者的敌人攻击刀锋舞者时，若{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了此次攻击，则会获得1次{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}的使用次数。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} la première attaque d'un ennemi, il gagne +1 charge de {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einem Angriff durch einen Angreifer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, der ihn erstmals attackiert, erhält er +1 Ladung {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g}.
